name: Linear Release
description:
Experience over 10 unique puzzles, testing both your ability with a bow and your ability to think outside the box. Traverse through unique levels, each sporting thematic background music to comfort your brain on overdrive.

Feel the satisfaction of winning and challenge your friends too! Not all that try will win.
